casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Robert Edgar UPCHURCH, Jr. No. 123P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 20, 2008. Charlotte Gail Blake, Boone, for Upchurch. *897Ronald L. Moore, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th day of March 2008 by Plaintiff for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 20th day of March 2008."
